#summary Description of GW's Dialog Format.

= Introduction =
GW uses some kind of html code to specify Dialogues.

= Format Description =

*Html alike Tags:*

|| *Tag* || *Function* || *Example* ||
|| `<brx>` || new Line || ||
|| `<a>` || Button || `<a=[nosep]DialogID>`This is a Button`</a>` ||
|| `<c=#rgb>` || Colorize Text || `<c=#D9D9E8>`This text is blue `</c>` ||
|| `<p>` || Paragraph || ||

*Special Strings:*

|| male form`[f: "female form"]` || Displays Text based on Character gender ||
